entry.title: 守望幸福
entry.content:
Hi，Nan

  Life was beautiful, so I was afraid to lose it. Whenever I want to go to bed at night, I feel very sick. It’s hard to accept that I will go to sleep forever and lose the whole world. Sometimes, I even wish I had never been born, but in my case, I would not exist. Thinking of it, I’m glad I’ve been to the world. Life is the killer we can’t beat

entry.title: Hello World, this is my birthday
entry.content:
Hi，Nan

往后余生，请多指教
